text:
NEW YORK , Oct.   About glass packaging Glass is used in the packaging of F&B, pharmaceuticals, chemicals, and cosmetics. Glass bottles and jars can be molded into a variety of shapes and dimensions, making them very appropriate for packaging. The inert nature of glass and its ability to preserve products for a long time make glass a popular choice for packaging in the F&B industry. 
Technavio's analysts forecast the glass packaging market in North America to grow at a CAGR of 1.69% by revenue and 1.94% by volume over the period 2014-2019.
Covered in this report 
This report covers the present scenario and growth prospects of the glass packaging market in North America for the period 2015-2019. The market includes all applications of glass packaging for various products. To calculate the market size, the report considers revenue generated from sales of glass bottles and containers of various types used in sectors such as: • F&B• Pharmaceutical and healthcare• Chemicals 
Technavio's report, Glass Packaging Market in North America 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the landscape of the glass packaging market in North America and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion on the key vendors operating in this market.
